name: rexlimivv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))

stmt.origin: rexlimiv(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0), w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wrex(s1, c1, w0), w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wrex(s1, c1, w0), w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

stmt.origin: rexlimdva(s1, c1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, w1)
stmt.pretty: rexlimdva(s1, c1, s0 ∈ c0, w0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wrex(s1, c1, w0), w1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| diffsw(s1, w1)

body.origin:
|- diffsw(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w1)
-| diffsc(s1, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s1, c0)

|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s1, s0)

|- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w0)), w1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s1, w1)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version). (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2004.)
